result.execSummary:
The defendant Jurgen E. Castillo was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Jurgen E. Castillo is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Jurgen E. Castillo was found guilty of Strangulation and Suffocation [Modifiers: Repeater], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.235(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.  Pay supervision fees.  Do not possess or consume alcoholic beverages and do not have alcoholic beverages within the residence.  Do not possess or consume controlled substances, except by prescription.  Participate in counseling deemed appropriate by your agent, which may include: alcohol/drug, anger management/DV counseling, psychiatric/psychological, AODA Assessment and follow-through with recommended treatment.  Counseling shall specifically include:  DV Couseling.  Actively search for employment, be employed or attend an educational institution or vocational training program.
*   Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.
*   If unpaid financial obligations remain at discharge or revocation, civil judgment to be entered.
*   Defendant is ordered to submit to a DNA sample & pay DNA surcharge and notice is given.
Cooperate with the Child Support Agency to establish paternity and/or to pay child support and make all court appearances in any paternity action.  May not have contact with Leah C M unless requested by her or her cousellor and  to be supervised but not by deft's mother, unless otherwise permitted by the court/agent.  May not possess any weapons, including firearms.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jurgen E. Castillo

records.addlTxt: Bond applied; partial refund;   jk/jg   ck#16CH076044
Conditions of Probation Imposed by the Judge

Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney D Henderson.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Court withholds sentence and places deft on probation for 3 years w/conditions consecutive w/Milwaukee County case 12CF6132; deft to pay $250 DNA surcharge; bond applied to costs, any remainder of bond to be returned to poster; no contact with Leah C.M. unless requested by her or her counsellor and then to be supervised but not by deft's mother.
Posted $2500 on 1/26/16

Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney D Henderson.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  On State's motion, cts 1, 2, 4 & 5 are dismissed.  Deft pleads guilty.  Court finds deft guilty.  PSI ordered.  DNA sample ordered.  SEH 3/28/16 at 1:30pm.  Bond continued.

Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney D Henderson.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Henderson requests to adjourn the trial date for reasons set forth on the record.  ADA Phan does not oppose adjournment.  Court grants adjournment of trial from 11/2/15 at 8:30am to 1/25/16 at 8:30am, JSH continued to 1/7/16 at 1:15pm.  Bond continued.

Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney D Henderson.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  ADA Phan states she was informed that the case was resolved and had called off witnesses, was just informed this morning that the deft changed his mind, but is not prepared to proceed to trial today.  JSH set for 10/15/15 at 1:15pm and JS 11/2/15 at 8:30am.  Bond continued.

Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney D Henderson.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Case set for jury selection.  Due to another case proceeding to trial on this date, JS is adjourned to 7/20/15 at 8:30am.  Bond continued.

Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney D Henderson.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Due to a conflict w/ADA Phan being in trial in Br 7 the JS of 3/16/15 at 9am is rescheduled to 4/27/15 at 9am.  Bond continued.

NO RECORD MADE.  Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Atty D Henderson appeared on behalf of deft.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Deft in custody but not brought over.  Case remains set for trial.  Bond continued.

No record made.  Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Atty Douglas Henderson appeared for def., who is in custody and not brought to court.  Clerk K. Zirbel.  Case set for jury selection 3/16/15.  New jury status hearing date set for 2/25/15 at 1:15 at request of parties.  Bond continued.
And demand for discovery - Filed by ADA J Phan
State's notice regarding deft's statements - filed by ADA J Phan
With Atty Henderson the JSH of 12/4/14 at 9am is rescheduled, as Atty Henderson was out sick; reset to 1/15/15 at 1:30pm.
Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney D Henderson.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  STC 12/4/14 at 9am and JS 3/16/15 at 9am.  Bond continued.
With Atty Henderson the time of the FPT on 10/23/14 is changed from 1:15pm to 11am.
With Atty Henderson the FPT of 10/2/14 at 8:45am is rescheduled, as Atty Henderson was unable to appear; reset to 10/23/14 at 1:15pm.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

Attorney Carli McNeill appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney D Henderson.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Henderson acknowledges receipt and waives reading.  Deft enters not guilty pleas.  DA PTC 9/19/14 at 1:30pm and FPT 10/2/14 at 8:45am.  Bond continued.
Filed by Atty D Henderson.

Atty Zach Wittchow appeared as Special Prosecutor for the State. Def. appeared (in custody) with Atty. Douglas Henderson. Clerk LE.  Plea offer placed on the record by the State.  Prelim. waived, probable cause found. Bound over to Br. 6 for arraignment on 8-27-14 @ 8:15am. Information filed. Bond continued.
Preliminary Hearing Waiver/Plea Offer
to Preliminary Hearing
Atty:  D Henderson.

141 p.m.  Attorney Patrick Anderson appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Law student R Kuszel supervised by Atty K Watson.  Clk  LE.  Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 10 days; set before Comm Mason on 8/7/14 @ 1030 a.m.  $2500 Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).

*Not to Possess or Consume Alcohol.  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  *No Contact w/ LMC (dob 2/19/98), Anastasia M, or their residence.  No discussion of this case w/ Teresita C.
